original_title: On the Way to the Moon, We Discovered the Earth
overview: On the Way to the Moon, We Discovered the Earth is a historical remix of the New York Times newspaper printed during the New York City Blackout in 1977. The 1977 Blackout is unofficially credited with the formal birth of hip-hop, a movement that was already well underway but advanced with equipment looted during the riots.
title: On the Way to the Moon, We Discovered the Earth
